lead_paragraph: Layoff notices went out on Monday for roughly 1,000 employees of Atlantic City's Trump Plaza Casino Hotel, in anticipation of a Sept. 16 closure, the company said in a statement.

headline.main: Pink Slips to 1,000 Casino Workers at Atlantic City's Trump Plaza
headline.print_headline: Pink Slips to 1,000 Casino Workers at Atlantic City's Trump Plaza
